Elements.Various.UISelectFromModelOnDemandInline

  value                                       id of selected variant   [variants = []]                             list of variants [loaded = false]                            true if we already loaded variants from server via API  [placeholder = "empty select item"]         placeholder title  [fieldname = "selectFromModel"]             this input fieldname  [modelName = ""]                            API modelName  [actionName = ""]                           API actionName  [optionId = ":_id"]                         variant object id field name  [optionTitle = ":title"]                    variant object title field name [required = false]                          field is required [readonly = false]                          field is reaonly [multiple = false]                          field is multiple  [size = 8]                                  size for multiple select [valid = true]                              field is valid[onreject = () => false]                    callback on reject of selection process[onresolve = () => true]                    callback on resolve of selection process[onerror = () => true]                      callback on error
